search_results.title: Interview: Ed Kanon, the fifth drummer of KISS
search_results.snippet: Ed Kanon stepped in as KISS drummer in 1997 when Peter Criss fell ill during the ”Alive/Worldwide” reunion tour. Roppongi Rocks' Stefan ...

search_results.title: Never seen before. Ed Kanon!
search_results.snippet: Never seen before. Ed Kanon! ... Peter's drum tech. Subbed for him for a show on the reunion tour when Peter's arms hurt and he couldn't play.

search_results.title: KISS Special – ED KANON
